← Back to list
JP

Number Expression Plugin

On create/edit, evaluates expressions entered in string fields when they start with '=' or '+' and replaces them with the numeric result. Supports subtables. Optionally map from a string field to a number field to mirror the result.

Edit screenCreate screenInput assistanceString fieldNumberSubtableCalculatorNormalization

Screens

PC & Mobile / Create & Edit

Category

Input assistance / Edit efficiency

File Size

~15KB

Updated

Sep 2025

Features

  • Safely evaluates expressions starting with '=' or '+'
  • Normalizes full-width digits/symbols
  • Supports decimals, parentheses, unary ±, and the four operations
  • Auto-converts on blur or save
  • Select target fields per app (subtables supported)
  • String→Number output mapping
  • Mirror results to number fields
  • Works on PC and mobile (create/ edit)

Screenshots

How to use

1

Install the plugin

Upload the ZIP in System Administration > Plugins.

2

Add to app

Enable this plugin in the target app.

3

Configure targets

Choose string fields and (optionally) subtable columns. Set output mapping to save results into

number fields.

4

Verify

In create/edit, type '=1+2' or '+(1+2)*0.5' and confirm it converts on blur or save.

limitations_en: "Only numeric expressions are evaluated (no functions, field references, or constants); Invalid

characters or unbalanced parentheses are not converted; Division by zero is not converted; Inputs not starting with

'=' or '+' are ignored; Conversion timing may vary with other plugins

Limitations

    FAQ

    s mobile supported?

    Yes, on create/edit views.

    Does it work in subtables?

    Yes. Select the subtable columns in settings.

    What syntax is supported?

    Four operations (+ - * /), parentheses, unary ±, decimals, with automatic normalization of
